# [Interview #1051: AMOL Signing Report - NutiketAiel, Entry #25](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1051#25)

#### NutiketAiel

#### Brandon Sanderson

When asked what his favorite Wheel of Time book was, Brandon said it was Book 4.
